description: This simple Mexican stew is delicious served with rice or tortillas and all the trimmings like guacamole and jalapenos.
keywords: Stew,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tomato,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mexican Chicken & Kidney Bean Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large capsicums, red and green, cored and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large casserole dish on medium high heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes. Add the chicken and capsicums and cook for 5 minutes.

Stir in the garlic and fajita seasoning and cook for 1 minute. Add the sweetcorn and kidney beans, pour over the chopped tomatoes and lime juice and simmer for 15-20 minutes until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has reduced.
Serve with chopped coriander, guacamole and jalapenos on top, if desired.
